transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji, namaskar ji.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Customer: Haan ji, aap Kouslesh ji bol rahe hain?
Executive: Haan haan, Kouslesh Kouslesh ji bol rahe hain, sahi hai.
Customer: Haan, achha achha. Achha aisa hai ki neto department ke officer aaya tha, to ek tender ke babat jo aapse isliye baat ho rahi thi.
Executive: Achha achha, haan.
Customer: To to ye department jo ye keh rahe hain ki humne koi tender nahi nikala hai.
Hain?
Customer: To aap mere ko please aapke paas ye information kaun se aati hai ye jo aap hame aage bhejte hain?
Executive: Sir, ye information aisa hota hai ki jab bhi koi tender post karta hai, hai na?
Executive: To IndiaMART ke paas ye list ho jata hai aur list hone ke baad isko hum GEM portal hota hai na, inki side hoti hai, inse aap puchhenge ki GEM portal pe jahan pe hum tender bharte hain.
Executive: To jaise aapka ye seller IndiaMART pe account bana hai, waise aapka GEM portal pe as a seller aapka account banta hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai, abhi usse ka
Customer: Ji, to main ye jaanna chahta hu, aap hame koi reference de sakte ho, mobile number ya unka website number ya koi unka address ho ki kis aadmi ne jo hai aapko tender ke liye aadesh kiya?
Executive: Haan, to ye sara information jo hai wo government ke side se hi milega. To aapko jo tender number mila hai, tender number aapke government ki jo side hai GEM portal, usme jab aap apply karenge, wahan pe phir buyer ke sath aapki sari connectivity ho jati hai.
Customer: Achha, GEM se milega?
Executive: Haan, GEM se. GEM pe aapka account bana hai ki nahi?
Customer: Nahi bana hai.
Executive: To aapko pehle account banwana padega as a seller.
Customer: Nahi, pehli baat to ye hai ki GEM ka account to hum banwa le aur jab ye department hi ye keh raha hai ki humne jo tender jo jari nahi kiya hai to uska aage karne jaane ka kya jarurat hai?
Customer: Hame jo hai GEM ka account banwaye, phir kya hoga? Tender number se kya, tender number se kya pata chala hai? Office mein baitha hu.
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Tender number jab aapne unhe bataya to us tender number se kuch information nikala?
Customer: Wo keh rahe hain humne tender koi kiya hi nahi hai.
Customer: GEM ke through ya kisi ke through bhi humne jo hai wo tender nahi dala.
Customer: Party se baat hui. Hame na koi requirement hai hamari. Main office mein baitha hu, yahan office se bhi baithe hain aur superintendent sahab baithe hue hain. To ye sare keh rahe hain ki hamara koi tender hai hi nahi.
Executive: Ab yahan pe to jitne bhi jitne bhi seller kaam karte hain IndiaMART pe tender pe, unse hamari jo baat cheet hoti hai wo aise karte hain. Unka GEM portal pe account bana rehta hai. Wo is tender number ko le jaake wahan pe fill karte hain. Fill karne ke baad hi sara cheez kya kehte hain phir unko details wagera mil jata hai, wahan pe phir apna dekhte rehte hain wo.
Executive: Samajh gaye? To abhi tak mere mere contact mein jitne bhi seller hain sab aise hi kaam karte hain.
Customer: To hame kaise pata chale abhi jo department keh raha hai ki hamare ko phone number ho tab to hum unse baat kare.
Executive: Ek baar phone number kya hoga aapke paas? Ab ek baar mein mujhe backend team se nikalwana padega na iski jo, kyuki hum log kyuki hamare paas jo buyer ka information hota hai wo wo inki IndiaMART ki alag team baithi hai.
Executive: Wo handle karte hain. Backend se please aap pata kijiye na, hum to aapke customer hain, hum to aapko puchhenge nahi.
Executive: Bilkul sir, dekhiye aapka aapka request sahi hai. Main aapka request create kar raha hu aage concern team ko. Request sir aap higher authority ko pass kar do na.
Customer: Main wahi keh raha hu. Aise aise jo hai wo hum hum pareshan ho rahe hain.
Executive: Wahi main keh raha hu, uske liye thoda sa time dijiye. Main aage aage mail initiate karta hu backend team ka ki ye jo tender information hamare paas receive hua hai iska koi contact details wagera mil payega kya.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, theek. Baki ek baar GEM portal ke liye aap unse baat kariye ki mujhe GEM portal pe as a seller account register karna hai to uske liye procedure wo bata denge aapko.
Customer: To account to free mein ban jata hai aisa nahi hai?
Executive: Haan, hum GEM portal ki jo hai wo condition puri nahi karenge, hum to aapki condition puri nahi kar paate hain.
Executive: Sir isme koi condition nahi hai, usme koi alag se charges bhi nahi lagta. Wo government ki side hai, usme account aapka free ban jata hai.
Customer: Achha ji.
Executive: Haan, to ek baar puchh lijiye wo aapko bata denge na ki mujhe as a seller wahan pe registration apne aap karna hai, mujhe account banwana hai, wo mujhe kaise karna hoga.
Executive: Okay, bataiye ki unko online portal pe mera IndiaMART pe. Chalo aap meri isse jo request hai sir meri aap forward kar do ki mere ko jo hai unka mobile number chahiye aur jo letter aaya hai uski mere ko photocopy aap wahan stamp kar do.
Executive: Sir ek baar main puchh leta hu kyuki unke paas details hoga to wo jarur forward karenge ya phir jo bhi information rahega wo hame bata denge, main aapko abhi update kara deta hu. Sir ye jo baat nahi hai aapke set table nahi hai ki hogi, hogi nahi. Aayi hai aapke paas. Dono cheeze bhi aapne aap. Dono cheeze sir possibility sir dono cheeze hain. Ab wo kya wo hame update degi.
Customer: Everything is possible. Everything is possible, not possible. Ye hoga.
Executive: I know sir but jaise sir dekhiye buyer ka information hota hai hum aapko immediately bata dete hain. Ab ye bhi aapka concern aaya to hum uske liye bhi isliye main aapse time mang raha hu na, thoda sa time dijiye main aage usko. Achha achha haan sir time time to sir lagega hi. Ji, isko sham tak kar dijiye.
Executive: Main dekhta hu jaisa hoga hoga main aapko call ke through update kar dunga sir.
Customer: Okay, okay, thank you. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants contact details for a specific tender.

- Department denies issuing the tender.

- Needs assistance with GEM portal registration.



Resolution:

- Explained GEM portal account creation process.

- Will check for contact details with backend team.

- Advised to contact GEM portal for registration.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update via call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, gem portal, contact details, registration
